The Ghoul
2
Welcome!
1/16/2025 12:12
This is your design notebook, where you'll record each step in your design process. Access this notebook from any step in the design process and make your own entries!
Your New Ghoul
1/16/2025 12:12
The Ghoul is a defensive ship filled with ghostly inhabitants.⏎As a Ghoul, your ship will be designed to fend off invaders and protect treasure.⏎Your Ghoul must include:⏎  ‣   At least two traps⏎  ‣   A protective layer for the ship’s deck⏎  ‣   A scary flag of your own design to intimidate invaders
